summary: MY CAR HAS BEEN TAKEN TO THE SHOP 4 TIMES IN THE LAST 3 MONTHS FOR THE SAME PROBLEM.  MY CAR WILL STALL OR JUST SHUT OFF.  INITIALLY THEY SAID THE OIL COVER WAS NOT PUT ON SECURELY AND THEY FIXED IT.  NOW THE CAR IS STALLING AND HARD TO SHIFT GEARS.  MY TRANSMISSION LIGHT AND ENGINE LIGHT ARE ON.  THE LIGHT IS SAYING TO SERVICE TRANSMISSION.  ONCE AGAIN I JUST GOT IT OUT OF THE SHOP FOR THE SAME THING.  TIRED CUSTOMER. SEVERAL TIMES MY VEHICLE WAS MOVING WHEN IT JUST STOPPED.  THIS LAST TIME I WAS AT A TRAFFIC LIGHT.
